00020 template<typename Point, typename Ptype>
00021 class cbb_work
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   
00025   static inline void eval(Point q, Point &q1, Point &q2, double R, Ptype max, Ptype min)
00026   {
00027     Ptype radius;
00028     R = ceil(R);
00029 
00030     radius = (Ptype) R;
00031 
00032     for(unsigned int i=0;i<Point::__DIM;++i)
00033     {
00034       if(q[i] < (min+radius)) q1[i] = min;
00035       else q1[i] = (Ptype) (q[i]-radius);
00036       
00037       if(q[i] > (max-radius)) q2[i] = max;
00038       else q2[i] = (Ptype) (q[i]+radius);
00039     }
00040   }
00041 };
00042 
00043 template<typename Point>
00044 class cbb_work<Point, float>
00045 {
00046 public:
00047   
00048   static inline void eval(Point q, Point &q1, Point &q2, double R, float max, float min)
00049   {
00050     float radius;
00051     radius = (float) R;
00052 
00053     for(unsigned int i=0;i<Point::__DIM;++i)
00054     {
00055       if(q[i] < (min+radius)) q1[i] = min;
00056       else q1[i] = (q[i]-radius);
00057       
00058       if(q[i] > (max-radius)) q2[i] = max;
00059       else q2[i] = (q[i]+radius);
00060     }
00061   }
00062 };

00066 {

00072     for(unsigned int i=0;i<Point::__DIM;++i)
00073     {
00074       if(q[i] < (min+radius)) q1[i] = min;

00084 class cbb_work<Point, double>
00085 {
00086 public:
00087   
00088   static inline void eval(Point q, Point &q1, Point &q2, double R, double max, double min)
00089   {
00090     for(unsigned int i=0;i<Point::__DIM;++i)
00091     {
00092       if(q[i] < (min+R)) q1[i] = min;
00093       else q1[i] = (q[i]-R);
00094       
00095       if(q[i] > (max-R)) q2[i] = max;
00096       else q2[i] = (q[i]+R);
00097     }
00098   }

00101 template<typename Point>
00102 class cbb_work<Point, sep_float<double> >
00103 {

00105   
00106   static inline void eval(Point q, Point &q1, Point &q2, double R, sep_float<double> max, sep_float<double> min)
00107   {
00108     sep_float<double> radius = R;
00109     for(unsigned int i=0;i<Point::__DIM;++i)
00110     {
00111       if(q[i] < (min+radius)) q1[i] = min;
00112       else q1[i] = (q[i]-radius);
00113       
00114       if(q[i] > (max-radius)) q2[i] = max;
00115       else q2[i] = (q[i]+radius);
00116     }
